newsitem.title: VENEZUELA: Venezuela bolivar softens to 475.75/476.00 per dlr.
newsitem.headline: Venezuela bolivar softens to 475.75/476.00 per dlr.

text.p: The Venezuelan bolivar softened to end the day at 475.75/476.00 per dollar as the Central Bank let the unit slip, traders said.
The bolivar closed at 473.75/475.00 on Thursday.
"The Central Bank let the dollar rise," said one trader. "They're looking at a 477 bolivars per dollar rate for the end of the month."

Traders described demand for dollars as strong, with the Central Bank only supplying dollars towards the end of the session. "The Bank only began to intervene after the bolivar had fallen," said one trader.
